overview: During the 1980s, technological advancement took a great leap into the future: what seemed to be science fiction then became reality. From the Sony Walkman to the computer, without forgetting Nintendo and Super Mario, this episode takes a nostalgic look at all this technology that emerged during the 80s, in order to define what we were able to do, but also who we were. were going to become.
title: The 80's: The Gadgets
